3 #permalink Blocks

Design components, seperated as blocks.

3.1 #permalink Button

Styling for buttons.

.button--primary
Primary button
.button--secondary
Secondary button
.button--third
Third button
.button--small
Small button
HTML 
<button class="button {modifier}">Button</button>

3.7 #permalink Select

Custom styling of the select box trigger.

HTML 
<label>
  Label
  <div class="select">
    <select>
      <option>Option 1</option>
      <option>Option 2</option>
    </select>
  </div>
</label>
<label>
  Disabled
  <div class="select select--disabled">
    <select disabled>
      <option>Option 1</option>
      <option>Option 2</option>
    </select>
  </div>
</label>

3.8 #permalink Checkboxes

Custom styling of checkboxes and radiobuttons.

HTML 
<label class="checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox"/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Label
</label>
<label class="checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" checked/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Label
</label>
<label class="checkbox checkbox--disabled">
    <input type="checkbox" disabled/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Disabled
</label>
<label class="checkbox checkbox--disabled">
    <input type="checkbox" checked disabled/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Disabled
</label>
<label class="checkbox">
    <input type="radio" name="radiotest"/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Label
</label>
<label class="checkbox">
    <input type="radio" name="radiotest" checked/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Label
</label>
<label class="checkbox checkbox--disabled">
    <input type="radio" disabled/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Disabled
</label>
<label class="checkbox checkbox--disabled">
    <input type="radio" checked disabled/>
    <i class="checkbox__indicator"></i>
    Disabled
</label>
